mapper.select: select h.ordercode, h.orderstat, o.totalpay, o.orderdate, i.itemName, d.shippingCode, d.receivAddr, d.receivContact, d.receiver from t_order_history h, t_order_info o, t_item i, t_delivery d where h.ordercode = o.ordercode and h.itemCode = i.itemCode and d.ordercode = h.orderCode

select h.itemCode,h.ordercode, h.orderstat, o.totalpay, o.orderdate, i.itemName, d.shippingCode, d.receivAddr, d.receivContact, d.receiver from t_order_history h, t_order_info o, t_item i, t_delivery d where h.ordercode = o.ordercode and h.itemCode = i.itemCode and d.ordercode = h.orderCode
select i.itemCode,price,ordercode from t_order_info o,t_item i where o.itemcode = i.itemcode
